job.title: Data Scientist (100% remote)
job.description:
***100% REMOTE - available for direct hire (or contract to hire through us here at Eliassen Group)***


We're looking for a highly skilled Natural Language Processing Data Scientist to support our innovative global client. This is an excellent opportunity to work with world-class analytics consultants to help a wide array of partner organizations!


Responsibilities of the Data Scientist:

  • Design, develop, and implement solutions for NLP use cases, leverage problems for AI, NLP, Computer Vision and Speech
  • Create, augment, and maintain state-of-the-art scalable NLP solutions in Python (bonus points if you can understand Java/.NET code to collaborate with development team, we aren't needing a full stack developer, but we strive towards the best architectural design possible!)
  • Interact with internal/external stakeholders to perform solution feasibility, design, and development/rollout

Requirements of the Data Scientist:

  • Bachelor's degree and at least 3 years of Data Science/Natural Language Processing (NLP) experiences with data exploration, preprocessing, and tuning NLP/Deep learning
  • AI/Machine Learning experience (Deep Learning, working with various sources like MongoDB, domain specific ontologies, external databases)
  • Work with our other Data Scientists to aid in enterprise-level/external analytical computing initiatives (Scipy, Pandas, Numpy, NLTK, Scrapy, Pattern, sklearn, scikit-learn, Django/Flask to improve Neural Networks, Markov models, Clustering, Random Forests, K-Means, Gradient Boosting etc.)
